/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with brick buildings, their red and brown hues adding a touch of warmth to the scene. Cars and motorcycles are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the busy life of the city. Trees and bushes dot the landscape, providing spots of green amidst the urban setting. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day.
